duties_responsibilities.duty: Test a variety of electronic units using prescribed test procedures
Set up and operate various test stands (automated and manual)
Recognize and isolate test equipment failures
Use diagnostic tools to troubleshoot electronic units to the sub-assembly and component level
Read and interpret technical data such as engineering prints and schematics
Communicate work status to team members and support staff
Understand theory of electronic circuitry and electrical components

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent
